name: Mad Monkey Bayswater
description:
Our crown jewel is the legendary rooftop, the heart of the hostel and your go-to spot for soaking up the sun, sharing stories, and mingling with fellow adventurers. Welcome to Mad Monkey Bayswater, where good times roll, new friends become family, and you get the best of Sydney right on your doorstep! 

Part of the renowned Mad Monkey Backpackers Group, we're set in a beautiful townhouse just off the vibrant Golden Mile in Kings Cross. We offer the perfect blend of Sydney excitement and cosy comfort, making meeting people effortless. When you're ready to unwind, our super comfy TV lounge is perfect for movie nights or competitive gaming sessions on the PS5. We pride ourselves on our welcoming, family-like atmosphere, making it easy to connect and create unforgettable memories. Our passionate entertainment staff keeps the fun going with amazing daily activities and unforgettable nights out! Plus, start your day right with free barista coffee available at the Happy Travels shop!

Here's what you get with every stay, all included in your room rate:

- Awesome Rooftop Access
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Complimentary Tea & Coffee
- Large Security Lockers (BYO padlock)
- Organised Events & Nights Out 7 days a week 
- Gaming Area, Pool Table & TV Lounge
- Free Barista Coffee (at Happy Travels)

We're perfectly located just a street back from the main Kings Cross buzz, so you get easy access to the best clubs, restaurants, and attractions without the late-night noise. Plus, we're only a 2-minute walk to train and bus stops for quick trips to the CBD and Sydney's stunning beaches.

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception is open 8 am - 8 pm. If you plan to check in after 8pm,, please inform us in advance, as our night manager will assist you.
- Check-out is before 10 am / Check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid physical passport is required for check-in. Photocopies will not be accepted.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

Come join the Mad Monkey Family – we can't wait to welcome you to your Sydney adventure

houseRules.notes:
We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

Reception is open 8am to 8pm. Please email to organise late check in by night staff (up to 2am). 

There is a night manager from 8pm - 2am to check-in any late arrivals

This property may pre-authorise your card prior to arrival.

A valid passport or international Photo ID is needed.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Mad Monkey Family!

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
